name: digitalproperty-app
description: Hyperledger Composer - Digital Property console application

scripts.test: npm run bootstrapAssets && npm run listAssets && npm run submitTransaction
scripts.submitTransaction: node cli.js landregistry submit && node cli.js landregistry list
scripts.deployNetwork: composer archive create --sourceName digitalproperty-network --sourceType module --archiveFile digitalPropertyNetwork.bna && composer network deploy --archiveFile ./digitalPropertyNetwork.bna --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 -A admin -S adminpw -l INFO && composer card import --file ./admin@digitalproperty-network.card && composer network list --card admin@digitalproperty-network
scripts.updateNetwork: composer archive create --sourceName digitalproperty-network --sourceType module --archiveFile digitalPropertyNetwork.bna && composer network update --archiveFile ./digitalPropertyNetwork.bna --card admin@digitalproperty-network && composer network list --card admin@digitalproperty-network

author: Hyperledger Composer
